section.p: The Procedure Findings section records clinically significant observations confirmed or discovered during the procedure or surgery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8078 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15417)/@code="59776-5" Procedure Findings (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15418)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8080, R2.1=CONF:1198-8080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8081, R2.1=CONF:1198-8081)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8090, CONF:8091)
Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15417)/@code="59776-5" Procedure Findings (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15418)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8080, R2.1=CONF:1198-8080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8081, R2.1=CONF:1198-8081)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8090, CONF:8091)
Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
